item.title: Website Update: Version 0.21
item.description: With my return home from another gruelling quarter of classes, I’ve revamped the look of my website once more. Here’s a quick “patch notes” if you will:

item.title: Website Update: Version 0.2
item.description: It’s been awhile since I updated my site, so when I came back, I decided to re-design/re-build it.
